nodes.text: The HWK-2000 was a starship created by Corellian Engineering Corporation sometime before Darth Krayt's reign as Emperor.

The HWK-2000 was only mentioned in the Legacy Era Campaign Guide, as a way to bridge a player's interest in more familiar ships and to show evolving designs. It was never given stats in the sourcebook, and mentioned only as something a GM could do, much like the C-wing from the first Starships of the Galaxy, but considerably less detailed.
